desc: Gig Morris Florist is a local flower shop that has been family-owned and operated business for over 30 years. We specialize in weddings, corporate, funerals, and everyday needs from small to large. We are a Belmar Florist but we deliver daily to from Belmar to Point Pleasant Beach to Tinton Falls To Monmouth Beach, NJ.

layout.text: we will be closed June 19th - June 26th
